lead_paragraph: Taylor Twellman scored on New England’s fourth shootout attempt after Matt Reis stopped Chicago’s fourth try, sending the Revolution to the Major League Soccer Eastern Conference finals with a 4-2 shootout victory over the visiting Fire last night.
